name: A Jerky Chicken
author: RIKKLEA
summary: A great Jamaican style dish. A spicy blend of herbs, vinegar, and a habanero pepper make this chicken dish unforgettable. Serve with rice, yum!
ingredients: 4  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch strips
directions: Combine the onion, brown sugar, soy sauce, vinegar, thyme, sesame oil, garlic, allspice and habanero pepper in the container of a food processor or blender
Place the chicken into a large resealable bag, and pour in 3/4 of the sauce
Squeeze out excess air, and seal
Marinate in the refrigerator for at least one hour
Remove chicken from bag, and discard marinade
Broil chicken for 10 to 15 minutes, turning once to ensure even cooking
Heat remaining sauce in a small pan, and pour over chicken when serving
